definition: to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]

sentences.english: Even hilly countries can be canalized.
sentences.chinese: 即使在多山的地區也可以開鑿運河。

sentences.english: We can see from this that initially the cave diggers aimed mainly at worshipping Buddha .
sentences.chinese: 可見，在敦煌開鑿石窟，開始時主要是宣傳佛教。

sentences.english: They bored a tunnel under the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 他們在英吉利海峽下面開鑿了隧道。

sentences.english: The peninsula was canalized to save ships traveling time.
sentences.chinese: 這個半島被開鑿運河，以節省船隻的旅行時間。

sentences.english: A new canal is being dub in that province.
sentences.chinese: 一條新的運河正在該省開鑿。

sentences.english: Song Defang Haotian reconstruction concept, and caves dug three holes.
sentences.chinese: 宋德芳重建昊天觀，並開鑿三洞石窟。

sentences.english: GuangYuan grottoes has already been cut in the later period of Northern Wei Dynasty at the latest.
sentences.chinese: 廣元石窟最遲在北魏晚期已有開鑿。

sentences.english: Yung Ping the Reds sank two new oil wells.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍佔領永平後，開鑿了兩口新油井。

sentences.english: The Red Flag Canal was dug by a spirit?
sentences.chinese: 這渠是靠紅旗渠精神開鑿出來的？

sentences.english: Platypuses use their nails and feet to construct dirt burrows at the water's edge.
sentences.chinese: 鴨嘴獸利用它們的指甲和腳在水邊開鑿土洞。

sentences.english: Tunnels are being cut through mountains.
Switzerland wants that freight underground, on the railways, and the new tunnel should achieve just that.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士希望這些貨物在地下鐵路通過，因此要開鑿隧道。

sentences.english: Topics of study include digging, ditching, grading, excavating, and more.
sentences.chinese: 課程包括挖掘，開溝，路基平整，開鑿等。

sentences.english: A tunnel has been bored under the channel to link England and France.
sentences.chinese: 爲連接英國和法國，一條英吉利海峽隧道已被開鑿。

sentences.english: The tunnel was dug by more than 300 young people.
sentences.chinese: 這個洞是由三百多名年輕人開鑿成功的。

sentences.english: Is the sand-stone terrain, the BTM machinery all with difficulty opens cutting.
sentences.chinese: 雪山隧道是四稜沙岩地形，BTM機械都難以開鑿。
